lines.text: One thing that's not really clear, is... what was Slick even doing here?
Why this room, and not another one? This is on like, the fourth floor.
I don't think we can say this is wrapped up until we figure that out, y'know?
Oh, we've got that one already.
He tried. Goin' through the other apartments.
Turns out everyone else locked their door at night. No big surprise.
These two must've been awake, and weren't plannin' on lockin' up until they went to bed.
Maybe on the hay bales? Or maybe they just have another place they live, and this is just an office of sorts.
Point is, Slick didn't bring lockpicks. He's done this before- goin' through a place, checkin' for unlocked doors.
Huh. So... he really was just a random burglar? No connection to the wizards?
